etymologies: mid 19th century: from Wuywurung (an Aboriginal language)

definitions: a low-growing bushy Australian eucalyptus which has several slender stems.

notes.text: Genus Eucalyptus, family Myrtaceae: several species, in particular E. dumosa

shortDefinitions: low-growing bushy Australian eucalyptus which has several slender stems

definitions: scrub which is dominated by mallee, typical of some arid parts of Australia.
shortDefinitions: scrub which is dominated by mallee, typical of some arid parts of Australia

definitions: any semi-arid area of mainland Australia which has mallee scrub as its principal natural vegetation

examples.text: moving to the Mallee was a major culture shock

shortDefinitions: semi-arid area of Australia with mallee scrub as main vegetation
